title: Conduct a Supplier Audit
description: A supplier quality engineer is conducting an on-site audit at a supplier's facility and needs to log their findings.

tasks.description: Open the supplier audit checklist for the specific supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent opens the pre-defined audit checklist in the system.

tasks.description: For each item on the checklist, record the finding as 'Conforming', 'Needs Improvement', or 'Non-Conforming'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent goes through the checklist, recording findings for each point.

tasks.description: For any non-conforming findings, create a Supplier Corrective Action Request (SCAR) and assign it to the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a SCAR for two non-conforming items found during the audit.
